solution_line_template: Micah had to buy {num_light_envelopes}*{stamps_per_light_envelope}=<<{num_light_envelopes}*{stamps_per_light_envelope}={stamps_for_light_envelopes}>>{stamps_for_light_envelopes} stamps for {num_light_envelopes} envelopes less than 5 pounds.
He has {total_stamps_bought}-{stamps_for_light_envelopes}=<<{total_stamps_bought}-{stamps_for_light_envelopes}={remaining_stamps}>>{remaining_stamps} more stamps to buy.
There are {remaining_stamps}/{stamps_per_heavy_envelope}=<<{remaining_stamps}/{stamps_per_heavy_envelope}={num_heavy_envelopes}>>{num_heavy_envelopes} envelopes that weigh more than 5 pounds.
